metadata.title: CVE-2024-26843 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: efi:runtime: Fix potential overflow of soft-reserved region size md_size willhave been narrowed if we have >= 4GB worth of pages in a soft-reservedregion.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-kvm package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
